name: IncrediBlox
description:
IncrediBlox is the next great puzzle game for your iPhone!

Drop blocks to form 2 by 2 squares and activate the IncrediBlox special powers! Over 60 Challenge levels will show you the ropes, then compete in the Infinite and Sequence modes to set a blazing high score!

- Addictive Puzzle Gameplay
- Beautiful Papercraft Art Style built for the iPhone and iPad High Quality Displays
- Over 60 Challenge Levels!
- Endless Random Gameplay with Infinite Mode
- Sequence Mode always gives you the same game so you can brag to your friends when you beat their high score.

F5 Games Website - http://f5games.com
Follow us on Twitter! - https://twitter.com/f5games
Facebook Us - http://www.facebook.com/f5games

"Ton of fun, recommended to anyone who likes puzzle games." - The Daily Appster Podcast

"recommended to fans of Tetris-like falling block games." - AppModo Review

"IncrediBlox comes through as a solid mobile puzzle game with a lot of personality!" - JayisGames.com
